text: Farsi, also called Persian, is a Western Iranian language. It is one of the co official languages of Iran, Afghanistan and Tajikistan and is also spoken by some people in Pakistan and Uzbekistan. ==Related pages== * Dari * Kurdistan * Near East * Caucasus ** Georgia ** Armenia ** Azerbaijan * Tajik language * History of Asia * Parthian Empire * Iranic languages * Sassanid Empire * Kurdish language * Indo-Iranic peoples * Achaemenid Empire * Indo-European peoples * Indo-European languages * Persian Inscriptions on Indian Monuments ==References== Modern Persian
title: Persian language
